definition: To overlook or neglect to remember something or someone, often used in the imperative form as a command. It is commonly used to express the act of forgetting or letting go of a memory, a task, or a person.

examples.german: Vergiss nicht, deine Hausaufgaben zu machen.
examples.english: Don't forget to do your homework.
Don't forget to take out the trash.
Don't forget to take your umbrella.

examples.german: Vergiss nicht, rechtzeitig zum Flughafen zu gehen.
examples.english: Don't forget to go to the airport on time.

examples.german: Vergiss nicht, deinen Geburtstag zu feiern.
examples.english: Don't forget to celebrate your birthday.
